description.translate: O sweet light of awakening, O deep and inalienable hope.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Tendre promesse\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ô douce lumière de l'éveil,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ô profond espoir inaliénable.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7O sweet light of awakening,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7O deep and inalienable hope.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HER§a1 §7DAR§c-2\"}"]}}
